citations.narrative:
In several of the rabbit enclosures, there was rust present on the wire, resulting in the enclosures no longer being able to
be effectively sanitized or cleaned as required under 2.56. Rust creates a surface that cannot be effectively sanitized
because of the uneven nature and can harbor organisms harmful to the welfare of the animals contained in the enclosure.
Correct by 10 May 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the manager.
n

narrative:
3.56(b)(3) 
   
Sanitation. 
In several of the rabbit enclosures, there was rust present on the wire, resulting in the enclosures no longer being able to 
be effectively sanitized or cleaned as required under 2.56.  Rust creates a surface that cannot be effectively sanitized 
because of the uneven nature and can harbor organisms harmful to the welfare of the animals contained in the enclosure. 
 
Correct by 10 May 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the manager. 
 
 n
